general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and services offered by Sharda University, spanning academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and School of Medical Sciences & Research, administrative functions such as examination reports and curriculum feedback, and student development initiatives including capacity building, language skills, and entrepreneurship. It also details university information like its history, leadership, and legal frameworks, along with specific services like FM radio and mentoring portals.

other_info.summary: This document lists various sections and initiatives related to Sharda University, including academic programs like BSc Mathematics, recruitment information, administrative details such as tenders and statutory bodies, student support services like counselling and skill enhancement, and guidelines for international students. It also highlights career prospects and placement opportunities for students in banking and other sectors, with an average annual package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA.
